description: Product metrics for Trackly including user activity, track uploads, and feature usage

panels.description: Deduplication ratio - higher means more duplicates detected
panels.title: Deduplication Rate (24h)

panels.description: Track Views (24h). Recommended thresholds: red <20, yellow 20-99, green >=100. Tune product thresholds as needed.
panels.title: Track Views (24h)

panels.description: Track Searches (24h). Recommended thresholds: red <10, yellow 10-49, green >=50. Adjust for product targets.
panels.title: Track Searches (24h)

panels.description: Active Sessions (24h). Recommended thresholds: red <10, yellow 10-99, green >=100.
panels.title: Active Sessions (24h)

panels.description: Enrichment Adoption (7d): enrichment success / uploads. Target >60% (green).
panels.title: Enrichment Adoption (7d)

panels.description: Export Adoption (7d): exports / uploading sessions. Target >30% (green).
panels.title: Export Adoption (7d)

panels.description: Track Edits by Field (7d): name vs description vs categories.
panels.title: Edits by Field (7d)
Funnel: Upload  View  Enrich  Export  Edit  Delete (7d)

panels.description: Active Sessions (7d): distinct session hashes with heartbeat.

panels.description: Active Sessions (30d): distinct session hashes with heartbeat.
panels.title: Active Sessions (30d)

panels.description: Deletion Rate (7d): deleted / uploaded. Target <5% (green), Warning >8% (red).
panels.title: Deletion Rate (7d)

panels.description: POI Creation Rate (7d): POIs created / uploads. Indicates power user activity.
panels.title: POI Creation Rate (7d)
